website_summaries.verdict: Sparkly accents make these a great choice for a night out on the water, but maybe not for an entire day at the pool or beach.
pros: Slender, accented straps lend versatility to this classic flip-flop design
Comes in Multi, Noir, Pop Rocks, and Shadow
Thin rubber, accented strap, comfortable EVA footbed, rubber outsole
cons: A bit narrow for wide feet

customer_reviews.title: If you love Reef's buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always very skeptical about buying shoes online because you can't try them on but before I bought these amazing shoes I measured my foot and read other's reviews. I'm a 8 1/2 but I ordered a size 9 since I read on the reviews to go a size up. I did and they fit and feel amazing! My last Reef Stargazer sandals lasted for 5 years and still looked like new and always felt comfortable. So I decided to buy another pair because I love these shoes so much! it's definitely cheaper to buy on Amazon than in Dick's Sporting Goods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I just love them. This is the 2nd pair I've bought. The last pair lasted about 4+ years, though the glitter does eventually come off. I wore them at the beach, in water, camping, pools, etc... They're comfy enough, though not nearly as squishy as some Roxy's I bought at Ross for $7.99. They're pretty sturdy. The strap actually just broke on my last pair, and that's why I bought the replacements. The thong piece didn't come up through the sole like most flip flops that inevitably break. They do run a little small. I normally wear a 7 1/2 and the 8s are perfect and more snug than my other flip flops that are size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve probably owned 30 pairs over the years, I like them so much...well, also, I’ve had several puppies who’ve “liked” them a little too much as well, but still. I'm in Hawaii, where we basically live in slippers, so finding a good pair is important. They come in a bunch of great colors and patterns, they’re comfortable, true to size, and the glitter stays put.
customer_reviews.author: MrsS

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but not as cool as I'd  hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Reefs, and I bought the Pop Rocks color because the photo looks super cool. Overall I'm pleased with them and they will go with a lot of clothes. But I thought the colors would be sort of "galaxy" with pinks, purples, blues, greens. What I thought would be the pink sparkle actually looks orangey to me, and I'm not a fan of orange. Sizing: I saw in reviews that Reef runs small, so I ordered a 10 even though I'm usually a 9/9.5. The 10 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: emory2001

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong size 2 times now. Pretty sandals but they don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: 2 times now I have ordered a size 8, and received a size 7 in the mail! The first time I thought maybe it was my fault even though I remembered clicking "8". So I returned them and ordered again, and made 100% sure to click size 8. Once again, I got a size 7. The flip flops themselves are beautiful and I really am sad bc I want them but I can't seem to get the correct size shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but narrow
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely bummed upon trying on these sandals. The footbed part was actually really comfortable and soft, however, my feet are just a bit too wide and the arches of my feet ended up rubbing on the rubber part of the strap instead of fitting on the footbed (which will definitely be a problem for me). In terms of length, I usually wear a 6.5, and ordered a 7, which worked out well! I will be returning these sandals since I'm anticipating they will hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops around!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sandals. They fit so comfortably and are easy to walk in. They are my go to flip flops. I love the soft padded sole. Very close to yoga mat feel. I got a pair 12 years ago and they just now wore down and broke. So I found these exact ones! They lasted me that long! And I wore them often!
customer_reviews.author: covergirl

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe! If you're a 5.5 , buy size 6 in Reefs. Love this brand! I used to have a pair of these that I got back in 2010. These have the same comfort/squish-factor, and appear to have the same quality. My previous pair lasted me 6-7 years. I have a moderately high arch and these do not have arch support, but I already knew that. If you have good stability in your foot, then these should still be comfortable even if you have a high arch. Very versatile which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Not bad just out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: These seem like pretty decent quality flip flops. The glitter on top had come off a bit on some parts, but I don't mind too much, as I will be taking them to the beach and they'll be getting sand all over them anyways. Not like these are for a fancy party or anything. But still, not good that the glitter is already starting to come off. Also, I prefer smaller glitter, like I had on my old sandals. However, these are pretty good overall so I would recommend these (so far) and I would probably get these again.
customer_reviews.author: camquatch

customer_reviews.title: Not what I am use to buying from REEF
customer_reviews.text: I love REEF flip flops..I buy a couple pairs every year. When I saw these on the internet, some I have purchased several times and loved I was excited. I love Reefs soft squishy souls. However, these are hard as a rock and comparable to cheap drug store flip flops and seem like a knock off. I returned them and would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Just-right Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for. Daintier, thinner straps; a comfortable foot bed with a surface that holds my feet nicely in place; a fun little sparkle that is not too loud (think the shimmer of sun sparkling on sand at the beach). I am normally an 8.5 and I ordered a size 9 which was just right.
customer_reviews.author: KayDee

customer_reviews.title: Cute but scratches skin
customer_reviews.text: Cute and the base is comfortable (for a flip flop). Fit as expected (I wear a 7.5 and always get size 7 with Reef). These were a bit shinier than I expected. The only real issue is the glitter is really rough and a little of it extends below the top of the strap to where it touches the top of one of my feet. So when walking it often rubs/scratches my skin. I just have to make sure when I walk I don't let the strap get pushed into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: jmcc33

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find my reefs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item while ago in Vegas and I could not find it for some reason anywhere in store until I found it on amazon. I love these flip flops. The quality is great and it’s beautiful. I loved how fast it was delivered and the price is good. Happy customer :)
customer_reviews.author: shirin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I will between an 8.5 and 9. I probably could wear an 8.5 but I don’t want to chance it. I absolutely LOVE these!!! High-quality and beautiful sparkles. They don’t turn your feet black but I got the navy blue ones and I’m ordering the black ones. Great price for flip-flops. I could easily play pay that at Ross or TJ Maxx if they were open Great price for flip-flops. I could easily please pay that price at Ross or TJ Maxx if they were open.
customer_reviews.author: MaKrash83

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flip flops! Wish I could give them 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to flip flops. I had two pairs that lasted me almost 5 years!! They both broke at the same time and I was heartbroken. I was so happy to see that they were available on Amazon Prime and for an AMAZING price. I bought two new pairs and am so happy I did. They are extra cushy and the rubber on the foot is super comfortable. I'm 7 months pregnant and can wear them all day with no issues. Bottom line: I Love, love, love these!!!!! I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ABarbs13

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and comfortable, I wear them EVERYDAY and they are sparkly ! I had the black ones but this time i bought the Mermaid Blue ! I think i actually like them better than the black ones. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these flip flops!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these flip flops!! Just what I was looking for! The yoga mat in sole is super comfy, and I love that that have an actual sole! I like the sparkly straps. They're good for every day. I bought a size 8 in stargazer black and they fit perfect. Soooo much better than Old Navy. Granted, the price reflects that, but I'm ok with it. Oh and they don't turn the bottoms of my feet black
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Schrotenboer

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these, and really wanted them to work for me. But they are made in the typical narrow fashion of women's shoes. Of course, being flip-flops, the problem isn't fitting into them, but rather my feet would spill out slightly over the edges of the platform... which just looks stupid. :( Still hunting for some casual flip-flops that will fit wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Preston

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking flip flops......love the bling........and comfortable as far as the cushioning on the bottom of your foot. Very bouncy and comfy. Unfortunately the part that goes between your toes is a bit uncomfortable. I feel the thongs are not positioned correctly and make the part in between your toes not as comfortable as they could be. Perhaps in time I will become more used to that feel, but I think for the price, they could be more comfortable between the toes!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Second pair and I still love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Reef flip flops. The first pair lasted around 6 years. They are sturdy, fit well, and are great in and around water thanks to the sole material. I wear a 7.5-8 in closed-toed shoes, have a high arch, and medium width foot with long toes. The size 7 in these haven’t changed from the last time I purchased them and they fit perfectly! Amazon: stop flipping photos and not allowing to edit or rotate! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have found these again after wearing out my three-year old pair. They have lasted amazingly well. I wear them frequently year-round. I posted pics of my old pair compared to the new ones. Super comfortable, and I get lots of compliments on them. The reason for the missing star is that on the right foot of the new pair the strap feels slightly twisted and cuts into my foot. I am hoping that I will be able to wear them in. If not, I may need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really loving these flip flops. They seem very sturdy and very comfortable. I went a full size up because I like a little extra length for my flip flops. Now that I have my size down I will be getting more of these in other colors for sure. I typically where 8.5 in gym shoes, 9 in boots or heels but went to size 10 for my best fit in these flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not for long wear
customer_reviews.text: These look good but gave me blisters on the top of my feet where the outer straps are. To be fair, I was doing a lot of walking that day but I have other flip flops that don’t do this no matter how long I walk around. I will just take these on short trips from now on.
customer_reviews.author: cc1969

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. these are my 2nd pair as I wore my old ones into the ground. They are comfortable and grippy on the bottom so I don't feel like I have to grip with my toes to keep them on. The only thing I'm not crazy about is the little on the straps. I'm not a glitter girl, but I buy them anyway for the comfort and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L Neale-May

customer_reviews.title: They hold up pretty well, including the bottom tread (I wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm already a huge Reef fan, but these are some of my favorites. They hold up pretty well, including the bottom tread (I wear them probably 3 days a week), the foam bottom doesn't smell like leather or cloth tend to do, the plastic thong is comfortable and doesn't snap like so many sandal brands do, they fit well, and they only get more comfortable with age. I've heard lots of people say to buy a size up, but I've decided I don't agree. I wear a size 7 shoe and a size 7 Reef sandal almost always.
customer_reviews.author: Eneella

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flop made!
customer_reviews.text: Great flip flop, I have worn these for years and finally got a second pair because sometimes I loose one. But they never flatten out and I have walked 100s of miles in them and they still look brand new. They are even comfortable when wet and the rubber part that goes between your toes never stretches out. WORTH EVERY PENNY and they are cute!
customer_reviews.author: AKmandy

customer_reviews.title: I love these flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops. I have actually bought another pair in store since. They are very comfortable and I can wear them all day. I didn't think they fit narrow or small. I usually wear between a 8.5 - 9 and bought the size 9M. They fit perfectly. Over time the glitter on the straps did start to wear off but I literally wore them every single day. The only down fall is that over time the bottom of my feet would end up turning black. However, like I said I wore them all day every day for months.
customer_reviews.author: JoeCanAm

customer_reviews.title: Reef
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and look just like the picture. I love Reef they make great quality shoes and they are very comfy. Reef flip flops tend to fit a little bigger than others so if you’re questioning sizes I would size down. They will also fill out after being worn for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Super cushy & She Loves them. ( I did good ) her words. Lol.
customer_reviews.text: Super cushy. She loves them. Loves !!! The thong part that goes in between your toes could be a little softer, but I was comparing that part to the hayn’s I got for her & its hard to be softer than natural rubber tree soft. Lol. Great sandals. Let’s see if they last. She lives in flippys so time will tell :)
customer_reviews.author: MP777

customer_reviews.title: no arch support
customer_reviews.text: The price was good and delivered on time. The product was as described. The issue is it has no arch support and the Reef sandals I have bought in the past have had arch support. I guess I have to buy the more expensive Reefs to get the support my feet need. I had to return these .....
customer_reviews.author: Jill A

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Flip Flops 5 years running.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals. I'm so glad they're available online consistently because I can't stop buying them! I received them before their expected arrival date, original packaging, and they're simply my favorite flipflops out there. They're cute, comfortable, and versatile. And they're affordable. I wear them so much that I inevitably trash them by the end of the summer (Last year I lent them to a friend and, understandably, never got them back lol). So I buy a new pair basically every year. They run true to size. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Strap rubbed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. They are cute and the footbed is comfortable. But the strap rubbed after walking a moderate distance. She plans to use them for shower shoes at the gym etc instead.
customer_reviews.author: Terri J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the same harder feeling flip flops that need to break in to be truly comfortable. That is not these! Right out of the package they are super soft. So excited to wear these! I feel like my feet are going to be so grateful for the support these offer over the Old Navy flip flops
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfy, but runs small..
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sandals! I was looking for something comfortable to wear to a theme park all day, especially something that would weather the water. These were it! Super stylish, cloud-like soles, and waterproof! I wore them for 8 hours and my feet felt pretty good at the end of the day! My only complaint is that they were pretty tight on my feet, especially considering they were size 10. I wear 9/10 in flip flops and never have issues, but these definitely run small. So if you have a thicker foot, I’d recommend something else. Otherwise, they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Rheannon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable flip flops I've ever owned. After YEARS of wearing these, I accidentally broke the toe piece and reordered immediately because I wear them so much and they're so comfortable. Even after years, the footbed hasn't "molded" to my foot, which I consider a good thing. The only way they look worn is the "Reef" logo having mostly worn off where my heel hits. The subtle sparkle on the thong part dresses them up a bit too. :) HIGHLY RECOMMEND these!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. GHM

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I returned for a size 10 (no 9.5) , it's barely any wider but it's acceptable, I'm used to wearing longer flip flops . I usually wear a size 9 due to wide feet however these are pretty narrow, I don't like the sides of my feet edge to edge on flip flips. The sparkle design is a little off on the straps
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy & great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m typically a 6.5 but I have 2 pairs of Reef flip flops and I wear a 6 since they don’t come in half sizes and they fit perfect! Very happy with my purchase. I used to always wear rainbows but lately my feet cramp everytime I wear rainbows so I will be wearing Reef’s for now on!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Horribly uncomfortable. The straps are thick plastic/rubber that isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Horribly uncomfortable. The straps are thick plastic/rubber that isn't flexible at all. I'm not hard to please when it comes to flip flops, but these are seriously hurting me. I've only been wearing them around my apartment so I've definitely been breaking them in properly, but they press on the knuckle below my big toe bone every time I take a step. I usually love Reef and I like the material for the sole of the shoe, but the straps are horrible and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fishburn

customer_reviews.title: The black plastic of the sole is very comfortable and is the primary reason I purchase these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Reef Women's Stargazer Flip Flop Sandals were purchased as a replacement for a previous pair I had worn out. In these shoes, I purchased a 7 as they are only sold in whole sizes. The usual shoe size worn is a 6.5 (US). The black plastic of the sole is very comfortable and is the primary reason I purchase these shoes. The strap of the shoe is covered in glitter, which does wear off over time, especially in sand. I would not say these flip flops provide arch support but most flip flops do not. The tread of the shoe is not slippery like some flip flops but provides traction on most surfaces. I would recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: R__B

customer_reviews.title: love these....so super comfy- after I made a minor adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops. When I first received them, the sparkly part scratched underneath the band on top of my foot so I didn't like wearing them. So I decided to shave underneath the band, where the sparkles were touching and rubbing my foot...great! Wore them 5 out of 7 days on my beach trip!
customer_reviews.author: Gemme decor

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfy. They are on the narrow side. I think I have narrow to normal size feet. So it’s fine for me. I like that the thong part has a glitter aspect but it’s muted. The glitter is in the rubber. So it’s stylish and not childish or too much bling for me.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love My Reef Flips!
customer_reviews.text: Always love buying Reef ... great quality, love the thin straps and they wear really well. I've been wearing Reefs since I'm in college and all these years later, know they're a go to when I need flips with style.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sandals, I like how cushioning it feels and the feel of durability. I just don’t like how the rubber material rub sometimes under my skin when am wearing it but it only happens sometimes so I give it a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Subtle Sparkles
customer_reviews.text: I love the subtle black sparkles on the strap. They fit well and are comfy. I'm a guy and these do not immediately jump out as being too girly. I wear a size 10.5 in men's. The size 11 fits pretty much perfectly. There's about 1/2" of the sandal past my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Swankglove

customer_reviews.title: Blisters!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. These flipflops are super cute but the straps left me with blisters after only wearing for a short time. They seem to fit fine so I’m a unsure exactly why the straps are leaving blisters. I’m really sad to have to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMALL & NARROW!
customer_reviews.text: SMALL! Same size as many other pair of reefs I own but these run small and narrow! Really cute but they don’t fit and the toe separator is hard and uncomfortable. A very different experience than my typical with reef. I normally wear a 6- I gave them to my child because I certainly can’t wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Straps were painful to toes
customer_reviews.text: I tried the sandals on and immediately was in pain. The straps are hard and uncomfortable. The glitter was cute but I'd rather have comfort over design with sandals, especially if it's mainly for beach wear.
customer_reviews.author: Crisco

customer_reviews.title: Not wide width
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet..i wish these were a bit more wide. I usually wear a 8 or 8.5. I got the 8 and they fit perfectly. Only issue i have is since i have wide feet there more snug in top of the foot. Maybe they will stretch out a bit on the sides hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediately ordered another pair!
customer_reviews.text: I am from Florida so I pretty much live in flip flops. After my "old reliable" pair finally bit the dust I had trouble finding a new pair that I liked. I took a chance on these and immediately ordered another pair. I love that they have the non skid bottom and are not cheaply put together. I wear an 8.5 and ordered the 9 and they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Candy Stresinshe

customer_reviews.title: Love Reef Flops
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flop by reef I have 4 pairs and quickly ordered the black. I wear a 7 in most all shoes and the other ones I have fit great. These however are loose. The length is correct the straps are the problem. I think a size 6 would be to short. I'm sure I will be ordering again. Can't help it I love them.
customer_reviews.author: debonly7

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I finally broke down to replace my black Reefs that I’ve had for about 7 years, which are the best flip flops I’ve ever owned and I can definitely say these do not even come close to the quality of shoes that I purchased before. They are much thinner, with less support and as a result are much less comfortable than my previous pairs. They are also a little shorter and a little narrower than before. The company is definitely skimping on material and it shows. They’re still comfortable but I can almost wear both pairs interchangeably but I’ve only had this pair 1 month. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wake

customer_reviews.title: Reef's are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef's so I knew to buy a size up. I normally where an 8 and can even slip into my cousins 6.5 Timberland boots during the winter, but with Reef's I need a size up to 9 as with most nice flip flops I need a size up, not sure why this is... But after they were broken in for about 2-3 days the comfiness gets right where I expected them to be. Love them. I found my first pair at a discount store back in 99' they were not of this material but more canvas like, still comfy! I had them for many yearrrs before they finally fell apart and still I continue to get new ones!
customer_reviews.author: lynsey🤘

customer_reviews.title: Cute and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I buy a new pair every summer. True to size. I like the sparkles, gives it more of a girly feel. I wear with just about everything. Simple look, stylish with anything that matches black. Further, it can get wet and not be ruined. The foot bed of this flip flop is very soft and comfortable. I usually prefer fabric straps, but I have not experienced much discomfort with the plastic on these sandals. They are easy to walk in and have held up well. I will probably repurchase in another color/style.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable but a bit on the small side. I ware comfortable 8.5 shoes but normally buy 9s if intend to do a lot of walking as the feet sometimes swell. But these fit like 8.5; no extra space
customer_reviews.author: not impressed

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty exactly like picture
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item and wanted something cute and simple to wear for summer. They fit perfect and are soft but the only bad thing is that the one in the right hurt my foot in between my big toe and the 2nd. I can’t have them on too long. I’m not sure if maybe the plastic is to thick on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: pretty pretty pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: The glitter straps are so pretty. I bought a second pair for back up. normally wear a size 7.5 and ordered an 8. Fit perfectly. Ended up ordering the navy directly from Reef.
customer_reviews.author: cal

customer_reviews.title: Not as the picture appears
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the flip flop is not what I received. I picked this out for a gift for my daughter to purchase. They came with different white print and the sole appears to be bigger than the several pairs I've purchased previously. So I thought the gift I received was a fluke, I ordered another pair. Now stuck with 2 pair of the same flip flops I won't wear. I always loved these and have them in various colors. Hesitant to order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Enderle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and no rubbing
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and look great with jeans or a dress. They don't have an arch support but I do find them very comfy. I also noticed that even when they are wet the top does not rub foot. Very Very comfortable. My daughter is always stealing them so I am going to buy another pair. I wear them all day without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are honestly the best I have ever own! The last pair lasted me 8 years!!! I will forever be buying these sandals!!! I am a size 8US and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: Reef has definitely changed their sizing. I have been buying their flip flops since I was in high school. I have always sized up a little when I buy flip flops because I like to have space. (I hate when people have their heel or toes hanging off.) I wear a 7 1/2 normally but have always got an 8. Well now I have to buy a 9 when I buy Reefs. I know my feet haven’t grown because I still have several pairs of my old reefs that fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SRQCustoms

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have super skinny feet, and they fit fine width wise and length wise, but they were very thin and there was no support anywhere. I did not like them at all and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Mops

customer_reviews.title: Love the older style-Bring these back!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a collection of these and recently found out the Reef has replaced them with a newer so called cushioned style. My husband bought me one of the newer ones and they are NOT as comfortable as the original ones. The cushion on these are amazing and so comfortable that you can walk around town all day with these. I can't find too many of the originals and they are pretty much all I wear all summer and beyond living in Southern California! Bring them back please!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef and these did not let me down. I get a lot of compliments on the sparkles. The thing part is plastic, but not the type that runs so much that it creates blisters on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: aconroy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic straps will rub your feet raw
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these are going to be really painful to break in! The rubber upper rubbed the top of my foot raw after just a few minutes :-( I really miss the old Reef fabric-strapped flip-flops!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loves them. Product arrived when they said it would and was exactly as described. Would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Oerdin

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but are they knockoffs?
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these shoes for years and had several pairs but this was my firs time purchasing them from Amazon. Unfortunately they have caused blisters on my feet between my second and third toe which makes me question if they are knock-offs since this has never been an issue in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Gulf Coast

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, but I ordered the same size as another pair of reefs I have, and these were significantly smaller. I returned them, and did not buy the next size up b/c I just don't feel like having my shoe size in bright white on the top of the sole for all to see.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Material is harder
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Reef for many many years, with this pair I found that the material between the toes is much harder than pairs I have had in the past and left me in pain wearing them for a couple of days on vacation. Not sure if they can be broken in, I don't think so judging by the hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. DeLost

customer_reviews.title: Very, very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my trip to Mexico. I wore them for 1/2 hour and only walked a very very short distance from my room to the pool and received terrible blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Csander

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Reef flip flops but for some reason mine decided to come apart? I’ve never seen this before! It wasn’t until I tripped when the sole came apart that I realized what was happening. Not sure if this happened to anyone else but just be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Boppel

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable flip flop ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are hands down THE MOST COMFORTABLE flip flops, EVER. I suffer from Metatarsalgia and the memory foam-like material makes me feel as though I’m walking on cotton. This is my 3rd pair! They last well over a year - and I wear them nearly every day. My dog got ahold of my last pair and I was devastated. I bought the other 2 pair at Bucees in Ft. Worth (I live in OK) and couldn’t travel back to replace them so I tried Amazon and here they were!! Thank God!! These shoes get nothing short of 5 stars from me!!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Pavao

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops! They have decent grip so when it’s wet your not sliding around. They are also super cushy and are comfortable. I wore them all day the first day I got them. No blisters or rubbing. I’m thinking I need all the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Bemac

customer_reviews.title: Do not use flip flops near water.
customer_reviews.text: I normally love reef brand flip flops because they never disappoint. These flipflips give you the sensation that they are not slippery, but when they get wet woah, you better watch out. I would recommend not using them if you plan to be near water(I mean, they're flip flops, that's what they're used for, no?). They are dangerously slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these flip flops! After years of rocking cheaper versions, my best friend talked me into purchasing a pair of these guys and I wish I had done so sooner. They are super cushy and I can easily wear them all day, even walk around on a college campus, and my feet/ankles don't hurt. I usually purchase a women's size 6 in sandals, but I sized up based on my best friends advice. She was right! I also like the fact that they aren't 'slippery'--every time I walked through a little bit of water in my old store-brand flip flops, I would slip! Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole CK

customer_reviews.title: Fit like butter! 🧈
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY SOMETHING THAT HAS GOTTEN BETTER! It's been awhile since I bought my last pair of reef flip flops (3 yrs). This could be premature.. but the second I slip these on my first thought was Dang.. these are so soft and form right to your feet unlike my last pair. Good job on improving your product!
customer_reviews.author: SYDNEY B.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most best flip flops I've ever bought. Normally I'm really cheap and buy $1 pairs at Old Navy, and they last me MAYBE a summer and they're uncomfortable. I finally decided to splurge and I'm so glad I did. They're thick (but not too chunky) and super comfortable! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Becker

customer_reviews.title: Best ever flip flops
customer_reviews.text: The Stargazer, dark grey flip flops are much cuter than in the picture. The top is sparkly so you can wear them to dress us or also with shorts or jeans. I usually have trouble finding flip flops that are comfortable for more than a couple of hours, but I've worn them all day without a problem. I wear a size 8 and ordered the same and they were perfect. I had read many of the comments before purchasing and I certainly agree with all of the 5 stars. I also ordered a pair of the Stargazer Sassy and they are the same.
customer_reviews.author: French

customer_reviews.title: Strong sole, soft insole, strong strap, cute model :-)
customer_reviews.text: My worry with flip flops is one day you'll be walking down the road and you catch the top of your flop on a rock and next thing you know your walking barefoot on the road with no shoe underneath you because the strap support busted through the sole. Luckily these flips seem super sturdy on the bottom as they're made with a harder plastic sole and a very soft insole. The glitter doesn't seem like the type to chip either so all in all I think this was a greay buy!
customer_reviews.author: TeZa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef flip flops and own several pair of the stargazers. These are made different and are very narrow. My feet fall off the edges and I have small feet. Doesn't fit like of my other reef flioflops, and I ordered my normal size😥
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Barr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering these every summer for years. This past year they made them bPA free which was good because I finally realized they would irritate my heels...but not anymore! This year they did make them narrower than in the past but still like their comfy fit!
customer_reviews.author: numbers4u

customer_reviews.title: My all-time favorite flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: Reef Stargazers are my all-time favorite flip flops and I have several pairs. The part that goes between your toes is molded/finished in such a way as to be barely noticeable and the straps are comfortable and never dig in. I usually wear an 8-1/2 in shoes but 9 in flip flops and these fit as expected. The glitter isn't too flashy, just adds a bit of sparkle. These wear really well too - I have a pair that I've worn for three summers and although the glitter has worn at the edges of the straps, the soles are still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a size 8.5 closer to an 8 in heels and these fit perfectly. So comfortable and cute. They are whisper quiet when I walk around. Seem to be good quality. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These are the only flip flops I buy. They last 2 years or more. I wear them all summer. Everyday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Causal, durable, cute
customer_reviews.text: Continues to be my go-to! Casual enough for day-to-day but the shine adds enough flair to wear to a variety of places. The rubber base makes them feel comfortable yet durable. These last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Inkii

customer_reviews.title: Possible knock offs, gives callouses
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these years ago in store, held up well for a long time. I bought these 3 months ago and wouldn't wear them at first because they felt a bit too short, gave in bc comfortable. Didn't last, they've gone nearly flat in a few spots already and are giving me callouses. Also the branding had nearly come completely off. Willing to bet these aren't official reef, but a cheaper knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love the lightness of the shoe and the very comfy ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the lightness of the shoe and the very comfy sole. I also like the glittery gold upper of the thong. I did not realize these would be glittery, and probably wouldnt have ordered them based upon that alone, but I love the look. Not overt and in your face, but more of a casual lightly bright gold tone, which looks lovely on tanned feet in the summer. I love my Reefs and order several pairs every summer. They never disappoint. They are a must have summer item for me. Super comfy and light. Not recommended for long walks, but perfect for short walks. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope they last a while
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty much what I expected although I have never spent this much for a pair of flip flops. I have seen a pair nearly identical at the drugstore and since these cost 3 times as much I hope they last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 9-10, got a 10 and it fits perfect. I consider my feet wide and flat-these flip flops fit perfect. Soft and durable, will get again if they ever break.
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the glitter already looked flaked off. Not quite the quality I expect from Keen. Part of me wonders if they're knock offs. But they do fit and look ok. Not bad enough to bother returning but not nice enough to wear outside of Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leifheit

customer_reviews.title: The strap changed :(
customer_reviews.text: I like Reef sandals but the strap on these is smaller than the previous flip flops. I didn't like that they changed it at all. Otherwise, they are awesome. The glitter on these now seems to stay on better, but honestly, the strap has me only giving it 3 stars. Seems like the flip flop base is not as wide as it used to be either.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They are the best
customer_reviews.text: Great flip-flops! Ignore all the negative comments. I was really impressed with these and they are very comfortable. Super great quality too :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Can wear these anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: These are the sandals to wear to the beach, the lake, the store, or just in your every day life. I LOVE them. Comfy and they last a long time. I get them a size bigger because they slip onto my feet better and easier. (especially after a pedicure). I have pretty much all of the colors for this style. A summer MUST!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. For me they are very comfortable as well as cute. Love the sparkles. I am wearing them right now, I practically live in them!
customer_reviews.author: William and Debbie Heller

customer_reviews.title: Love Reef flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: Reef flip flops have been my go to for the last few years. This is my second time buying this pair! To date they are my favorite! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers. Very comfortable. Depending on how severe your arch is, these slippers do not provide arch support. However, I can wear them all day with no problems. The only conflict I have are they are not water friendly at all. If you wear these in watery areas, your feet will slip around. I've some close calls with falling while wearing them in Tahiti around wet surroundings, so be mindful of where you wear them to. I still give them a 5 star because they're great looking slippers with their glittery bling.
customer_reviews.author: mulan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, size up if you wear a half size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I wear a size 7 1/2, so I ordered the size 8 since they don’t have half sizes. They fit perfectly, and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Classic Flippy Flop
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this one for decades. Fashions come and go, but this is a classic. Can't go wrong with a fresh pair.
customer_reviews.author: Big D Jorie

customer_reviews.title: Casual chic and dressy in one!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 and bought an 11. So far the glitter has stayed on. I have seen no evidence that it may come off either. I wear these everywhere with everything. So cute with shirts, skirts, pants! They have that casual chic dressy vibe. Luv!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: My Reefs are my favorite flip flops ever. I had my previous pair for 7 years until they finally broke (after almost constant wear during the spring through fall). Replaced them with these and love them just as much!
customer_reviews.author: beara1701

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are cute but they are painful. The rubber rubbed on the top of my left foot and I couldn’t even walk with them. I now have a deep scab on my left foot. Reef slippers are usually comfy but this one is very painful. If I want to wear again, I’ll need to put a bandaid to help protect my foot.
customer_reviews.author: GG

product_meta.title: Reef Women's Stargazer
product_meta.description:
Reef women's sandal

Reef is surf. They're inspired by water, by the ocean, by perfect waves, and the journey along the way to find them. They are a genuine, global surf brand that harvests the best of the lifestyle and shares it through authentic, innovative and fashionable product. At the core of Reef is their Latin roots and the inherent sensuality of the beach. The Reef team is committed to having fun in and out of the water, as well as giving back to the world that inspires them.
